verses.name: Proverbs 29:20
verses.text: Seest thou a man that is hasty in his words? there is more hope of a fool than of him.

verses.name: Proverbs 29:21
verses.text: He that delicately bringeth up his servant from a child shall have him become his son at the length.

verses.name: Proverbs 29:22
verses.text: An angry man stirreth up strife, and a furious man aboundeth in transgression.

verses.name: Proverbs 29:23
verses.text: A man’s pride shall bring him low: but honour shall uphold the humble in spirit.

verses.name: Proverbs 29:24
verses.text: Whoso is partner with a thief hateth his own soul: he heareth cursing, and bewrayeth it not.
